tech_news.description: Google’s Pixel 10 works with AirDrop, and other phones should follow later.

tech_news.title: Tides of Annihilation continues to look awesome in new dimension shattering gameplay - Eurogamer

tech_news.title: Mixup is a new, Mad Libs-style app for creating AI images from photos, text, and doodles - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The new app lets anyone use Google's Nano Banana in a fun new way, with fill-in-the-blank AI "recipes" that users can share.

tech_news.title: Windows handhelds are getting the new Xbox Full Screen Experience tomorrow - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft is releasing its Xbox Full Screen Experience for all handhelds on November 21st. It’s also testing the mode on regular Windows 11 PCs.
